thread.title: Rachel Appoh Delivers Speech At 2015 Summit Of The Global Forum For WIP In Mexico
thread.title_full: Rachel Appoh Delivers Speech At 2015 Summit Of The Global Forum For WIP In Mexico - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Rachel Appoh Delivers Speech At 2015 Summit Of The Global Forum For WIP In Mexico
text: The Women in Parliaments Global Forum ( WIP ) and the Mexican Senate co-hosted a unique meeting of female Parliamentarians that marks the 40th anniversary of the First World Conference on Women in 1975 from the 7th to 9th of October 2015 . The
